strings.string: CZE_Change your digital satellite receiver settings

CZE_Set one of the pre-defined transponder frequency and symbol rate to get the best signal strength and quality in order to confirm that your settings are correct
CZE_If you set to 'On', both the existing transponders and additional transponders that have not yet been stored to be located are scanned for new channels
CZE_When set to 'Off', only the factory default transponders of the satellites you previously selected will be scanned for new channels.

CZE_When set to 'Same with Tuner 1', both tuners are connected to the same signal source
